arts.ttl: Christopher Nkunku scores first international goal to put France 2-1 up against Israel by setting himself up with an OUTRAGEOUS Cruyff Turn that bamboozles three defenders
arts.sum: Chelsea and France forward Christopher Nkunku scored his first international goal for Les Bleus by teeing it up with an outrageous no-look turn on the edge of the area.

arts.ttl: Israel 1-4 France: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Madrid's Camavinga stars
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at the highlights, man of the match, and stats from Thursday's Nations League clash between Israel and France.

arts.ttl: Three things we learned as an Eduardo Camavinga-inspired France beat Israel
arts.sum: Amid all the talk of Kylian Mbappé’s absence, France put in a controlled display as they beat Israel in the UEFA Nations League (4-1) to close the gap on Italy…

arts.ttl: Nkunku scores 1st France goal in win over Israel
arts.sum: Christopher Nkunku celebrated his return to the France team with a goal in a 4-1 victory over Israel in the Nations League as Les Bleus edged closer to A2 Group leaders Italy on Thursday.

arts.ttl: England loses to Greece as Carsley experiment backfires and France wins without Mbappe
arts.sum: After leading England to back-to-back victories since becoming temporary coach after the European Championship, Carsley felt emboldened enough to field a team without a recognized striker in the absence of injured captain Harry Kane. Erling Haaland became Norway’s record scorer at the age of 24 with a double in his country’s 3-0 win over Slovakia, while France — playing without Kylian Mbappe and the retired Antoine Griezmann — still had far too much for Israel in a 4-1 victory.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Israel 1-4 France: Les Bleus shine in attack without Kylian Mbappé
arts.sum: France aimed to take control of their UEFA Nations League group as they travelled to Hungary to take on Israel. Les Bleus suffered a defeat to Italy on the first…

arts.ttl: Why is Kylian Mbappé not playing for France against Israel?
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé is not part of France’s squad for their upcoming Nations League fixtures against Israel and Belgium due to injury and as such he will play no part in the games for Deschamps’ side. His Real Madrid teammate Aurélien Tchouaméni will take on the armband for Les Bleus as Kylian stays at home to recover from a thigh injury that he suffered in Madrid’s 3-2 LaLiga win over Alavés on Sept.

arts.ttl: Liverpool to 'finalise' Virgil van Dijk deal after 'agreeing' Ibrahima Konate contract
arts.sum: Liverpool are reportedly preparing to finalise a new contract for captain Virgil van Dijk once they wrap up fresh terms for fellow defender Ibrahima Konate.

arts.ttl: Israel vs France: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: France will hope to jump a few places in their Nations League group when they face Israel in Budapest on Thursday night. Les Bleus were torn apart in their first game of the Nations League by Italy despite taking a first-minute lead before recovering to beat Belgium in their second outing.
